title: What exactly does it mean to see yourself wearing a tight dress in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a detailed interpretation of a vision of a tight dress in a complete dream, and the interpretation of this vision varies according to the condition of the viewer. Seeing a tight dress means the end of worries and sins and the end of marital and emotional problems. It is natural for a person to have a strange and unrealistic dream that leads to anxiety and psychological distress. There is cause for concern, and we have collected for you, my dear friends, all the visions and interpretations from the books of interpretation and major visions. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a tight dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin Muhammad bin Sirin indicated in his book Interpretation of Dreams that wearing a tight dress in a dream can indicate the disappearance of worries. Also, this vision can indicate healing and getting rid of diseases that afflict the seer and the abundance of money that the seer will obtain. Also, seeing a guest wearing a full dress in a dream can indicate many problems and then getting rid of them soon, and it can also indicate a lot of happiness. Interpretation of tight clothing in a complete dream for a woman in general If a girl dreams that she sees a tight dress in a complete dream, this means that the girl's worries will be removed and she will be happy in her life, God knows best. Also, seeing her wearing a tight dress in a complete dream may indicate her closeness to God Almighty and may also indicate that she will join a new job. Also, seeing a woman wearing a tight dress in a complete dream can indicate the girl's many fears and indicate that she will fall into many sins and disobedience and move away from God. Perhaps seeing a woman wearing a dress Tightness in a complete dream indicates the death of a reckless girl and her close marriage to a righteous man, and God knows best. A tight dress in a complete dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream a vision of wearing a tight dress, this indicates the collapse of her worries, as well as obedience, happiness and peace of mind. This vision may also indicate crises in his noble work and many difficulties and calamities, and they will pass and the seer will get out of them soon, and God knows best. Seeing yourself wearing a tight dress in a dream may indicate the collapse of marital disputes surrounding the viewer and may also indicate marital happiness. Interpretation of seeing wearing a tight dress in a complete dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a tight dress, this means that her upcoming affairs will be easy and her child will be born easily, and God knows best. Seeing yourself wearing a tight and short dress in a complete dream can also indicate the end of pregnancy and childbirth and can also indicate a lot to live for. Interpretation of seeing a man wearing a tight dress in a complete dream In a dream, wearing a tight dress, this vision can also indicate the end of the dreamer's worries and also the abundance of happiness that he will find in his life. Perhaps this vision can indicate To good and happy news and it can also indicate positive developments that will occur in the life of the seer and a lot of money. Also, seeing the purchase of a tight dress for his wife in a complete dream can indicate his intense love for his wife, as well as the collapse of the disputes in which the dreamer falls.

title: Interpretation of the grave in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of a grave in a dream, which is considered one of the frightening dreams for many. Seeing a grave causes anxiety and confusion to its owners, because they do not know what these dreams mean, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will learn about the interpretation of a dream in a grave in its various cases. Interpretation of a grave in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: The vision of a grave in a dream The grave in a dream is not recommended for interpretation; Because it indicates the occurrence of misfortunes and the coming of death, and it means separation. Whoever dreams of an open grave, his dream indicates that he is suffering from sadness and worry. If one dreams of a white grave, this means that the dreamer will lose a friend, either through separation or death. Among the promising visions about the grave are In a dream, seeing it with beautiful and green flowers, because it indicates the dreamer’s salvation from his worries and sorrows, and the coming of blessings and blessings in his life. The vision of going to a grave indicates the loss of the fortuneteller’s money and the diminishment of its value among those around him. Whoever dreams of standing on a grave, this is a sign that the dreamer will suffer. From temptation that may be in his family, home, or religion. Seeing a person buried in a grave without dying means that he will fall into a calamity or become upset and sad. A person coming out of the grave in a dream means his freedom from illness, poverty, and ignorance and his emergence from darkness into light. Digging a grave in a dream Evidence of the dreamer’s marriage to a miserable woman. And whoever sees that he is walking among the graves, this means that his life is going randomly and that he suffers from confusion in his decisions. Interpretation of seeing a grave for an unmarried woman: If an unmarried woman sees that she is visiting a dead man at his grave and weeps over him in a low voice, then her dreams It indicates that there is great joy on the way to her. Whoever sees that he is buried in a grave and covered with dirt, this means that he will soon feel sad and distressed. A girl’s visit to graves is evidence of her regret for delaying her marriage and may indicate that she enters into a marriage experiment but it ends in failure. If a girl dreams That she is walking among the graves, this is a sign that her marriage will be delayed for a period like the period in which she walked. It is a good dream for a girl to walk over the graves, because it is a sign that her marriage is near. Whoever sees that he is afraid of the shape of the grave in the dream means that he is afraid of the idea of ​​marriage and that he will undergo an experiment that will fail. In the end.Interpretation of a married woman seeing a grave in a dream: One of the unpleasant visions is for a married woman to visit someone on his grave, this means that she will be separated from her husband, or that she will suffer from worries and sorrows. If a married woman dreams that she is digging a grave for her husband, then the dream indicates the presence of problems Between her and her husband it could lead to divorce. A woman burying her husband in a dream means that she will never have children. A wife’s dream of an open grave is a warning for her, because it means that she will contract an illness in reality. One of the wife’s auspicious dreams is that a child comes out of the grave, it means that she will become pregnant Soon with a male child. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream in a grave. If a pregnant woman sees that she is burying a grave, her dream indicates that she will soon achieve her dreams and ambitions. Seeing the grave in a pregnant woman’s dream

title: What is the interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream and the dream of reading it when you are afraid of Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The meaning and interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream: One of the visions that jurists and translators have paid attention to is the dreamer’s vision of the Holy Qur’an in general and Ayat al-Kursi in particular. On the specialized Egyptian website, we wish to provide the strongest interpretations of all the symbols that appear to a person in his dream, and in the following paragraphs we will reveal to you in detail the interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream. The dream. The Throne Verse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin was interested in interpreting all the verses and surahs of the Holy Qur’an, as each surah has a different meaning from the other in the dream, and the following lines will reveal the most prominent interpretations that Ibn Sirin realized regarding the following: The appearance of the Throne Verse in the dream: The first explanation: When the dreamer reads this noble verse in a dream, this is a sign that God has given him the gift of thought and intelligence, in addition to protecting him from all machinations or harm from others, and these two blessings are among the greatest blessings that God has given. To a man. The first blessing, which is high mental abilities, puts its owner in the best condition because it includes wisdom, good behavior, and the ability to plan. As for the second blessing, which is divine protection and preservation, it is a reason for concealment. The dreamer and keep him away from all his enemies and no one will be able to harm him. But something serious must be emphasized for all the dreamers who see this vision, which is the necessity of paying attention to the worship of God and not being lazy about it, because if the dreamer is certain that God has granted him these blessings, he begins to neglect . Worship him, and God can remove these blessings from his life overnight. What is meant is that the dreamer seeks higher levels of religiosity and piety in order to obtain greater and greater blessings than what he has. The second interpretation: If the dreamer sees a group of people and sits among them and recites this noble verse to them, then the vision is worthy of praise. It confirms that he is a healthy person and has a healthy body, and Ibn Sirin said that he will be rid of any affliction. Perhaps the word “scourge” in the interpretation means that his heart is free of evil and malice, so he wishes to grieve for others. Third interpretation: Recitation of Ayat al-Kursi by a seeker of knowledge is very praiseworthy, and this means that if he has a degree of knowledge, God will give him twice that, and if he succeeds Without excellence, he tastes the taste of excellence and excellence. And if he fails a lot due to his personal and health circumstances, his following days will all be success and joy. Fourth interpretation: Good health and well-being to every patient who reads Ayat Al-Kursi in his sleep, God is giving him a sure sign through the dream that he will recover - God willing - and the pain and sadness will turn into great joy and he will enjoy strength. The physical one, which he has missed a lot. The fifth interpretation: Whoever wants God to grant him status and authority, he will have that in a short time if he sees in his dream that he is reciting the Throne Verse. The sixth interpretation: One of the most important types of sustenance is that God (Glory be to Him) gives a person guidance and avoids many temptations. To Satan, reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s guidance and status. Religiosity will soon rise and his circumstances will change from worse to better. Seventh Interpretation: When a person recites Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream or recites verses from it, this is a sign that

title: Interpretation of seeing a handshake in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a handshake in a dream, as the handshake is the elegant way that people use to show respect when meeting others, and the methods of shaking hands differ between peoples according to the customs of each place. Familiarity and appreciation. When you see in a dream that you are shaking hands with someone, whether you know him or not, whether he is alive or dead, this definitely carries a sign. The interpretation of this sign varies depending on your psychological state towards Imam Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi for unmarried and married girls and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing a handshake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the handshake as evidence of the existence of love and appreciation between the dreamer and the person who is shaking hands, regardless of the age or gender of that person, male. Whether it was female or not. With someone you love, it means that there are strong bonds between you. If you see that someone refuses to shake hands with you, this means that he is going through hardships and pain, but if you refuse to shake hands with this person, this is an indication of an upcoming journey with the dreamer. When one sees that he is shaking hands with a king This is evidence that the dreamer will soon rise to his position, but if this king dies, this is almost good news for joy. Interpretation of shaking hands in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi explained that shaking hands in a dream is a good sign and good connotation. When you shake hands with someone you know, this means that there are feelings of love between you. And between that person. As for shaking hands with someone you do not know, this is a good omen that the dreamer will not face torture in the future. When you see shaking hands with a dead person, this means that the dreamer has a strong relationship and love for this person. When you shake hands with the enemy, this is a good sign that feelings will change To love and respect. Interpretation of shaking hands for individuals: If an unmarried woman sees herself shaking hands with another woman in a dream, this is a sign that a lot of good and happy news is coming, according to the beauty of the other woman. When a single woman dreams of shaking hands with a man, this means that she is on the verge of a new stage, It may be travel, education, or work. When an unmarried woman sees herself shaking hands with one of her parents, this means that her engagement or marriage will be facilitated soon. If an unmarried woman sees herself shaking hands with a married man or a foreigner, this means that she would like to marry someone who looks like him. When a single woman sees herself shaking hands with a foreigner, this is a good sign that she will one day be promoted. When an unmarried woman sees that she is shaking hands with one of her neighbors, this is a sign of the entry of a new love into her life. When an unmarried woman sees that she is shaking hands with a dead person, this is a sign Good in that she is pure and chaste. Interpretation of a dream about shaking hands with a married woman: Shaking hands with a married woman is the best evidence of the stability of her life. If you see her shaking hands with her husband, this is evidence of her love and obedience to him. When you see a married woman shaking hands with her father, this is evidence of the stability and success of her life, and if she shakes hands with her mother, this indicates the arrival A lot of food for her home. When a married woman sees herself shaking hands with one of her children, this is a sign of love and peace of mind. If a married woman dreams of shaking hands with one of her children, this is a sign of love and peace of mind.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: For this reason, we decided, through our interpreter website, to provide you with the complete interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream, the interpretation of seeing the number 10,000 in a dream for a single woman, and the interpretation of the number 60 in a dream for married people. A woman sees the number 63 in a dream, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream for a single girl. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream is a clear indication that the dreamer is looking forward to something happening in her life. He now lives in a state of waiting and preparation until what he wants is achieved. He says Some modern dream interpreters say that the number 64 indicates the marriage of single women, but this marriage will face many problems and pressures. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 63 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. This number indicates in a dream A married woman indicates that she is going through many positive changes. This will happen soon in her husband’s life and she must adapt to these changes. Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream about the man and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The first interpretation: The fortuneteller will do many good deeds. In the coming period, such as contributing to building a mosque or hospital, or providing a service that benefits people. As for the second interpretation, it symbolizes the dreamer entering a new phase in his life that will be a good sign for him and his family, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the number 65 in a dream for a woman Single, married, and a man. The meaning of seeing the number 64 in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from psychological pressure and intense fear as her birth approaches. But the dream assures her that things are going well and she will be reassured about her fetus, and it will be safe and sound, God willing. God. Interpretation of the appearance of the number 64 in a dream for young people and its meaning. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 64 in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will find the right partner for his life. And a happy year full of positive events that satisfy his heart and delight his eyes, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number 222 in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says You will see that seeing the number 222 and its derivatives in a dream. It is a sign for the dreamer that his marriage is approaching, if the dreamer is single or single, and God knows best. Seeing this number in a divorced woman’s dream means good tidings and hearing good news about the coming period. This number in the dream of married people It expresses kindness and sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about the number 333 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the number 333 in a dream indicates good luck that accompanies the dreamer in many aspects of his life. This number is considered a number of happiness, good news, optimism and happiness. This number indicates that there are many opportunities Available to the dreamer, which he should make good use of. It will completely change his life for the better and also represents success and academic excellence. The meaning of seeing the number 444 in a dream according to Ibn SirinUsually the number 444 in a dream shows logic, wisdom, and the ability to make fateful decisions in critical moments. Seeing this number in a divorced woman’s dream means good tidings and hearing good news about the coming period. This number in the dream of married people It expresses kindness and sustenance. This number is considered a number of happiness, good news, optimism and happiness. This number indicates that there are many opportunities Available to the dreamer, which he should make good use of. title: Learn about the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirini Receiving pregnancy news is one of the most beautiful news that anyone can hear and it can help spread joy and happiness throughout the family. In this article, let us get to know them. Pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy by Ibn Sirin shows that the person will face many difficulties and problems in his life in the coming period, and this will make him feel very upset. He did what he had to do with the faith that God (the Most High) would never waste his effort. If the dreamer sees a pregnancy in his dream, this expresses that he will be exposed to many unpleasant events in his life in the coming period that will greatly worsen his psychological condition. A girl who loves a lot and feels happy about it. Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Dream Interpretation Secrets website. Pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing an unmarried woman pregnant in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is a sign that she is performing many good deeds that contribute to her closeness to the Lord (Glory be to Him), and this increases the possibility of Blessing and goodness in it. Life: If the dreamer sees during her sleep the pregnancy of someone she knows. It is not satisfactory for her at all. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is pregnant by someone she does not know, this means that she will receive a lot of money in the coming period and that she will achieve many achievements on the practical level, and if the girl sees in her dream that she is pregnant and unhappy and crying with a burning heart This expresses her dissatisfaction with her current situation and wants to change her behavior for the better. Pregnancy in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. A married woman’s dream of pregnancy, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, indicates that she will have many good things in her life during the coming period. She is very upset and will feel very relieved after that, and if the dreamer sees in her dream that she is pregnant, this symbolizes that her husband will get a lot of money from his work soon and blessings will come a lot in their lives after this. In case the dreamer sees in her dream that she is pregnant and newly married, then this It means that she is carrying a child in her stomach without realizing it, and she will find out about this soon and will be very happy. In fact, this is evidence that she will be exposed to many unpleasant events in her life in the near future. Pregnancy in a dream about a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a pregnant woman who sees pregnancy in a dream as an indication of her constant thinking about the condition of her fetus and her intense fear of being exposed to some Harm. She sees in her dream that she is pregnant, and this indicates her fear of the difficulties that she will face in the process of giving birth to her fetus, and she fears that she will not bear the pain. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is pregnant, this symbolizes her fear of the new period that will bring many responsibilities for her. She fears not having her family and is afraid of her weakness. In her duties. For her new baby. Pregnancy in a dream for a divorced woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream because she is pregnant, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, shows her many attempts at that time

title: What is the interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant while I am single according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream that I am pregnant and I am free in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of the dream that I am pregnant and I am free in a dream is considered one of the interpretations in which many interpretations have arisen, but in general, the dream of pregnancy brings goodness to its owner unless it conveys some scenes. It is out of the ordinary, and many women have sought to interpret a dream that I am pregnant while I am single in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Sirin, and I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone and happy. Interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant alone according to Ibn Sirin, in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an unmarried pregnant girl, the This dream indicates her adherence to religion and its goodness, and Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation is that seeing an unmarried girl pregnant indicates the goodness and good news that will come. For her in this world, and Al-Nabulsi saw in this vision that it brings distress and inspiration to this insight, and these interpretations come with the dream of pregnancy according to the girl and how it was in the dream, regardless of the relationship of this insight with Almighty God and the actions that she does. What is the interpretation of the dream that I am married? And I am single? Seeing a pregnancy in a dream indicates the blessing of God Almighty, goodness, and abundance of money that will come to the woman with the vision in the coming period, while this was stated in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of a single woman’s pregnancy in a dream. It indicates the anxiety and disagreement that will happen to her in the coming period among her family. In addition to the appearance of a group of problems in her family’s home, she will be the cause of them, and this dream may also indicate that the dreamer or someone from her household was exposed to an accident that affected her or a theft in the house. What does pregnancy mean in a dream by Ibn Sirin? The interpreter Ibn Sirin reported that pregnancy in a dream It conveys good news to the dreamer. As for the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream that she is pregnant, this indicates increased sustenance and a lot of money for this coming period. For a man who sees himself pregnant in a dream, this indicates many sorrows and worries that will come to him in the future, and this vision in a man’s dream may indicate that he has already died, so the interpretation depends on the situation. Where the dreamer is in the dream. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone and I was happy. It is related to the interpretation of my pregnancy that I am pregnant and I am single and I was happy that this dream shows the rapid arrival of good news of success and success in the work that this visionary is doing and she is waiting for its results more than hot on the topic of her marriage as soon as possible Some scholars have suggested that seeing a pregnant unmarried girl in a dream indicates the bad reputation that the girl enjoys among members of society. It is noteworthy that the interpretation of dreams depends on the dreamer’s condition in the dream and the time this vision occurs. Ibn Sirin dreamed that I was pregnant while I was alone, and I was happy.

title: Interpretation of seeing face to face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a prominent eye in a dream. A prominent eye is the appearance of an eye noticeably to others and it can be in both eyes or one eye. Seeing a prominent eye in a dream can indicate goodness, or it may be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil. The eye either It was for a human being, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, in its various meanings. Today, through the Roya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing out of sight in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, or Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dreamer’s vision is that his eyesight has weakened and his eyes cannot see. Clearly, this indicates feelings of anxiety, tension, and instability in his life. The dreamer’s weak vision shows his inability to make critical decisions in his life. The dreamer’s sharp vision indicates the strength of his personality and his ability to solve his affairs. Interpretation of seeing a blindfolded man. A man sees himself walking blindfolded or blindfolded. It indicates that The monarch puts himself to a severe test. Seeing a man in his eye in a dream indicates insight and spirit and does not symbolize the real eye. Seeing a man is an evil eye looking at him in a dream. This indicates that there are those who are trying to destroy him morally and materially, but he will defeat them. Interpretation of seeing the eye in a dream For a woman: Seeing an eye in a woman’s dream shows her children and religion. Seeing eye diseases in a dream indicates that she has harmed her children or her money. Seeing the eyes cleansed and treating diseases shows her upbringing. Seeing a woman with a glass eye shows that they are sensitive to emotions and feelings. For a woman to see her having an eye of silver or gold denotes her wealth, purity, and chastity. A woman saw that someone had put out her eye and it indicates evil that befell her son. Seeing a woman losing her sight declares her fascination with the magic of the world. Seeing many eyes in a woman’s dream mentions her many grandchildren. Interpretation of seeing many eyes in a dream. Seeing many eyes in a dream indicates the religious dreamer and the soundness of his religion. Seeing many eyes In the womb of the viewer. It indicates that the fortuneteller is an infidel and a heretic. Interpretation of seeing an eye made of wood or metal in a dream. Seeing wooden eyes in a dream: It symbolizes the viewer’s indifference to the words of others. Iron sight, which indicates the dreamer’s affliction with them and his distress, and reveals to him a secret. Seeing a glass eye in a dream, it indicates The fortuneteller defends the saints of others. Seeing the golden eye symbolizes the viewer’s self-sufficiency and lack of need for others. Silver sight means the seer’s asceticism in the world. A diamond visual sight indicates the viewer’s attachment to the world and the intensity of his love for it. The copper eye It indicates that the seer is practicing injustice and slander against others. Interpretation of eye colors in a dream. Seeing a black eye declares religion. Seeing a blue eye declares the dreamer a heresy. Seeing a pale eye in a dream says that he does not follow the teachings of religion. Seeing a green eye indicates that you follow a religion that is contrary to the religion of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the whites of the eyes in a dream. Seeing the whites of the eyes in a dream indicates a separation The person and the viewer are injured

title: Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead

preview.html: Seeing the dreamer feeding the deceased a lot of food means kindness and an increase in blessings in his life and the livelihood that he will receive. Interpretation of the vision of feeding the dead in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman saw that she was feeding a dead man in a dream, and she saw him hungry in the dream. This indicates that she will receive A lot of goodness and sustenance in her life, God willing. And if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the dead person asked her for food, and she ate it in front of him and did not give it to the dreamer. It indicates the stinginess and selfishness that characterize single women in their society. And if the unmarried woman sees that the dead person is trying to find food through her , and prevented him. It indicates the bad things that this single woman does in her life during this time. And also unmarried people who bring in a dream a lot of food to the dead. It indicates that he is calling and giving charity to the soul of this dead person. And seeing the unmarried woman was seriously searching About food for the dead person in a dream. It shows the good that this single woman is doing in her life during this time. And seeing the unmarried woman trying to eat food in front of the deceased in the dream while feeling sad in the dream. It shows the bad things that the single woman will see in her life. See also Interpretation of the chest of a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead person feeding a married woman in a dream. Seeing a married woman in a dream who was trying to feed the dead in a dream and she was happy. It indicates that he prays alms and supplications for the soul of this dead person. If a married woman sees in a dream that the dead person asked her about food and did not give her It indicates selfishness, betrayal and betrayal that this married woman commits in her life. And if the dreamer sees that he was preparing a lot of food in a dream for the dead person, it announces the many goodness and blessings that she will see in her life, God willing. And the married woman who eats food in front of the dead person while he is eating in... The dream. It shows that he will see some bad things in life during this period. Likewise, a married woman saw that the dead person was asking her to bring him food and it was a specific type in the dream. This indicates that he is asking her to believe in his spirit and his supplications as well. Interpretation of seeing the dead person feeding the dead person In a dream for a divorced woman: Either a divorced woman sees in a dream that the deceased asks her for food in the dream and gives him more. It indicates the good that this divorced woman will see in her life, God willing. The divorced woman was looking for a corpse to feed him in the dream and she was very happy. It appears that she will get rid of all problems and things. The bad things in her life. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream eating food in front of the dead and she was hungry. It indicates the selfishness and betrayal that exists in the personality of this divorced person. They will be exposed to some problems with these toxins. He also saw in the dream a divorced woman searching for food to give to the dead person and feeling sad. It shows that he He wants charity or supplication for his soul at this time, and God knows best. Or the divorced woman who is looking for the dead person to feed him in a dream while she is sad. This indicates that he will see some things that are contrary to him at this time, but he will get rid of them, God willing. And the divorced woman
